attributes.action: Fully recompense the veterans suffering the after effects of witnessing the atom bomb tests in the 1950s without further procrastination
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is sufficient evidence to support the claim that those personnel who witnessed the atomic bomb tests during the 1950s in Australia were not fully protected from the then known risks and have suffered extensively since. They should be generously compensated.
